short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ribbet is a free online collage maker and photo editor with beautiful filters, seasonal effects, touch-ups, stickers and fonts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We also offer Premium membership for those users wishing to take advantage of our Premium editing tools.

Key features:

- Grid photo collages with over 50 unique layouts, and ability to import directly from social networks
- Snap your collages and edits to preset sizes, including social media timeline and profile photos, photo print sizes etc.
- Single-click shape collages with thousands of shapes to choose from
- New Fancy Card feature to instantly create greeting cards, customized with your own photos and text. Share your creation online, print it at home or create physical cards through the Ribbet Lab
- Free cloud storage for your uploads
- Unlimited editing history: re-open your saved edits months later, rearrange elements and change text, colors etc.
- Thousands of hand-picked designer elements, frames, textures, filters, effects and premium fonts
- Import your own custom textures and elements, and use fonts installed on your computer
- Complete set of Touch-up effects to apply virtual makeovers, change hair and eye color, plastic surgery and much more
- Basic effects including resize, crop and auto-fix
- Advanced photographic tools including curves, clone and levels
- Seasonal elements, frames, textures and effects for everything from Christmas to Halloween
- Bookmark your favorite effects
- Add layers to your photos and erase parts of those layers
- Use photos from your computer, Facebook, Flickr, Picasa Web Albums, Google+, any web URL, your webcam or your editing history

We have recently released many exciting new features including dynamic grid collage to allow for unlimited collage layouts and dimensions, an exciting new interface with multiple themes and background grids, apps for mobile devices, searchable tabs, and much more. We also offer prompt and free support for all our users.
